author: richselby
title: Small but Perfectly Formed
review:
This wee shuttle is at the other end of the scale to 2010's 10213 Shuttle Adventure, but I think the designer has done as good a job as can be imagined for its size. Sure, the nose cone isn't rounded, but it uses only basic parts. No specially moulded nose-sections here, as per Utility Shuttle 60078, which would have been on the shelves when this model was handed out.

Given this was a freebie set, given to attendees at the Lego Shop's monthly mini-builds of February 2015, it represents unbeatable value for money. It might even be worth sourcing on the secondary market for a few pounds.
